scene_description_enriched: A bearded man, identified by a halo as a saintly figure, is seated and engrossed in reading from a lectern. He wears a white tunic and a red and gold robe. Beside him, a small, furry animal, possibly a dog or a lion cub, sits attentively. The background is a vibrant blue with gold decorative patterns. To the right, a section of text from a manuscript is visible, framed by an ornamental border.
